document_data.level2e: This spell is listed as a 3rd-level spell in both Champions of Valor and Demihuman Deities but is listed as a 4th-level spell in The Drow of the Underdark.
document_data.mainbody:
Lesser spellsong was a spell used by clerics of Eilistraee.
A weaker version of spellsong, this spell gave the caster the ability to immediately prepare a single divine spell for use. The spell was cast normally, even if it required casting components. The spell could not be greater than a 1-level spell.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required a divine focus.
